scripts.docs:api:postman: docker run -it --rm -u $(id -u) -v $PWD/docs/api-spec:/data emiketic/development sh -c 'cat /data/*.apib | apiary2postman blueprint > /data/index.postman_collection.json'
scripts.docs:api:postman:alt: docker run -it --rm -u $(id -u) -v $PWD/docs/api-spec:/data emiketic/development sh -c 'cat  /data/*.apib | drafter -f json -o /data/index.json && blueman convert /data/index.json --output=/data/index.postman_collection.json && rm -f /data/index.json'
